resources.string:
Hi I am Rahul Priyadarshi. 

I am passionate about technology, backend development, analytics, and machine intelligence. Having served as an Intern and then System Engineer for over a year. I have a demonstrated experience of working in teams and across groups. 
So far, I have done a number of data science projects including, Recommender Systems, Web development using angular, spring, struts, and RPA using AssistEdge(Automation tool). 
I have developed my skills in Java programming, Data Structures and having prior experience can comfortably work with R programming, C, Kotlin, JavaScript, Unix Shell script, Github, My SQL, and Python. 
I have basic knowledge of deep learning, Matlab, and Big Data. I've participated in various coding events. Also, stood third in the coding event organized by interview bits. 
With a keen interest in Web Development, Data Science, and Machine Learning, I am working and expanding my horizons in this field, nd I am always open for initiatives, challenges, and roles in every field. xd..................... :)
